CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsSoqlQueriesUsed__c / LimitsSoqlQueriesMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsSoqlQueriesUsed__c / LimitsSoqlQueriesMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsSoqlQueriesUsed__c / LimitsSoqlQueriesMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsSoqlQueriesUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsSoqlQueriesMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsSoqlQueriesUsed__c / LimitsSoqlQueriesMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: SOQL Queries
